data.title: Full Stack web developer
tasks: Collaborated and built a real estate rentals platform that automates and eases the rental process with multiple features like generation of rental agreements, complex financial accounting and payments tracking. Led many architectural and engineering decisions throughout the project

Collaborated in the development of a Saas platform providing multiple services to real estate developers. Helped with system design and code refactoring. Solely developed and led severals decisions in some parts of the platform and its subprojects and features like making of financial balance sheet auto calculator by implementing complex calculations in user-friendly spreadsheet-like interfaces. Contributed on the development of other complex and advanced features such as multi-layered maps with some 3d layers.
Analysed requirements, wrote tasks and issues and actively helped manage and estimate the projects.
Helped deploy and monitor several apps and websites and intervened with hotfixes and QFE update even in off-work hours.
Helped and Contributed on the making of user-friendly UX/UI designs, and interactive tutorials for the company apps.
Closely worked with the project manager and the product owner

data.title: Full Stack web developer
tasks: Built a real estate search and matching platform to ease & simplify real estate searching for end-users.
Implemented advanced filtering & accurate suggesting systems by utilizing matching calculations based on user-intered data.
Refactored the existing code and built end-users and admin panels UI.
Analysed requirements, prioritized tasks and milestones, mentored & helped team members to use project management tools.
Setup linux server, deployed the platform, managed and monitored the software and hardware required infrastructure.

data.title: Lead Angular Frontend developer
tasks: Laid the architecture and foundation of frontend apps including main features.
Helped and mentored trainees about Angular, Rxjs and Ngrx with redux patterns.
Coordinated work of front-end and back-end dev teams

data.title: Full Stack web developer
tasks: Laid the architecture and foundation of frontend and hybrid mobile apps.
Created Frontend admin app as well as multiple responsive web apps for the clients and end-users.
Created two cross-platform mobile apps (in Ionic Framework for Android and iOS).
Helped and mentored team members about Angular and Typescript.
Engaged in research and development to find the best tools and solutions for several use cases.
Collaborated with the UI/UX design team to make good looking and user-friendly UI interfaces.
